Maximum video filesize in kilobytes. Zero for unlimited.

SSCXfer (forked from Vidiom) - Video capture and web video publishing tool. ORIGINAL VERSION - http://vidiom.net.au

The camera failed to start recording. Sorry.
The SD card access failed, so we can not record videos. Sorry.
You have not recorded any video yet.
You are still recording video. Please stop recording first, then send.
We can not connect to the video hosting service. Check your preferences please.
We can not login to your account on the video hosting service. Sorry. Check your FTP host username and password preferences please.
Recording finished. Video file is in gallery as
You can upload this video via the gallery.
Login to Facebook to upload videos.
Either the maximum filesize for video, or maximum recording duration, was reached. You can set these in Preferences.
Please set up a google.com email account with which to log into YouTube.
Do you really want to delete the video? This deletes the file from the disk as well as removing from the database!
Can not launch video player, sorry!.
You have no videos in the library.
HTTP/S Proxy for Tor and other services
